website_summaries.verdict: Straightforward usage and assembly makes these speakers a great purchase for anyone.
pros: High quality of construction makes it extremely weather resistant
Protective paint coating blocks UV damage, water corrosion, and moisture damage
Sound quality is good for small size
cons: Can take some time to mount depending on the specific wakeboard

website_summaries.verdict: A small and convenient way to either add or upgrade an existing audio system on an ATV.
pros: Small form with decent sound output and volume
Capable of playing sounds and music at around 400 watts
Comes in at 4 inches, making it easier to fit to several different areas of an ATV, including the mirrors or handlebars
cons: Speaker mounts require extra fastening to secure to roll bars

customer_reviews.title: Fit Honda Pioneer 1000
customer_reviews.text: I have not tested for audio quality as my amp has not arrived. I am posting this to let Honda Pioneer 1000 owners know that these will mount to the roof railing with 2 pieces of the rubber filler on each side. Mounted mine in the middle section behind drivers seat facing downwards at the outermost edges which made them easy to tighten since I have the roof and access to the screws is difficult without removal. I will update as the work progresses.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: They sound great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after I did a ton of research. I am always outside or at bonfires listening to my truck stereo. with the doors open at bonfires or just outside in general smoke and bugs always get in the truck with the doors open or windows down. So I bought these marine grade speakers and mounted them under my toolbox on a 2" aluminum bar, they are being pushed with a pioneer 480 watt 4 channel amp. THEY SOUND GREAT!!! I am completely satisfied. I wired in a switch to the remote wire to turn them off when I don't need them. These speakers are super loud. Would def recomend these to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: super easy to hook up
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 91 Jeep yj for the roll bar, but I guess I mismeasured because the plastic clamps did NOT fit around my roll bar. Nothing some work with a back saw couldn’t fix though. Got them mounted, super easy to hook up, look badass, and sound great. Everything is crisp and clear and LOUD. Recommended for Jeep owners if you know how to use a hack saw, but otherwise make sure you measure properly because they WILL MOT fit on a 1991 Jeep yj roll bar.
customer_reviews.author: parker linss

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Speakers
customer_reviews.text: I am the owner of a business that builds wake tower speaker mounts for personal watercrafts, and these are the speakers I recommend. I personally have a pair of these mounted on the back of my Sea-Doo, and they slam! I am not using an amp, and have them paired with an Infinity head unit with a max rating of 50w per channel. Many months of brutal abuse, and they are still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua James

customer_reviews.title: 1995 Jeep YJ Roll Bar install.
customer_reviews.text: 1995 Jeep YJ install. Speakers sound really good. Mounted them on the roll bar. Fit great. No modification needed in the location I chose. Would buy them again in a heartbeat. Great value for the money. Used $7.00 off coupon. Can’t touch speakers like this for double the money.
customer_reviews.author: Walleye Dude

customer_reviews.title: Tricky seller
customer_reviews.text: The speakers were bigger than I thought and could not swivel and were sticking out side the confines of the soft top of my 73 Bronco with a full roll cage. The ad states that there is free returns for prime members. I had one out and tried it in several spots without moving any hardware. Repackaged as was and seller screwed me for 50%. Would have kept them if I known that and layed them on a shelf. Seller is a not a nice person...bad business person....good teacher...much thanks for the lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: Man these things work great! I use them on my golf cart and they get rattled around a lot but still working great.Sound is good and they look very nice. Ive had them installed for over six months now. My only suggestion to the manufacturer would be to add an adapter for the mounts for smaller diameter tubes. If they came with that it would be a five star item.
customer_reviews.author: gary wigington jr

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I've been running these for the last few ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've been running these for the last few months in my FJ40. They mount securely to the roll bar and have plenty of power when connected directly to my head unit. I can hear my music clearly with the top off at 60mph on 37" tires. They are compact enough that they won't be right in the face of the rear passengers, like most other wake board speakers.
customer_reviews.author: stumpalama

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome ! The sound is incredible and they couldn’t be easier to install I have 2 mounted on my rzr 800 which is pretty loud and you can hear these things clear as day while driving don’t waste your money on buying those other expensive wake tower speakers the sound is crisp and very loud for such a small speaker definitely going to buy more and recommend to my buddies
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: After deciding between the 6.5" or these speakers I got these and they are awesome. I installed them on a 2012 Polaris rzr 4 900 and they are loud and clear. Used a boss 500w 4 channel amp and they sound great. They don't distort even at full volume. And look much better then the 6.5" speakers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on Kawasaki mule roll bar
customer_reviews.text: Put these on a Kawasaki mule 600. I had to use some bike inner tube to make a spacer shim but them work fine for this application. would be hard to hear on a boat but perform very well for their size. I bought a roof mounted console for " high powered" radio and pair of 6 inch speakers. added these to get 4 speaker system on the Mule. I had no room for rear speakers or an amp but these work well and are water resistant at least.. Very satisfied. I would suspect that their larger speakers would work great on a boat.
customer_reviews.author: Paul P.

customer_reviews.title: Installed in 1993 Jeep YJ
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually pretty impressed with the quality. Install was pretty easy. They did not fit on any of my factory roll bars, the bars were just slightly too fat and I didn't want to risk breaking the plastic brackets by grinding them out. I installed them on my harness bar with a couple loops of black duct tape to fatten the bar and making them a tight fit. They sound great and look great even without an amp.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my boat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement speakers for my 2004 Sea Pro 220 WA. Installation was pretty straight forward. Did it by myself. The speakers come with several (six I believe) thick rubber pads to reduce the diameter of the mounting hole so it is secure when mounted. Took about an hour to do it right. I needed to remove the boat’s old speakers in order to make room for these speakers. Sound quality is outstanding. I have no amplifier, and these really sound nice even at wide open throttle off shore. You really can’t go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler Hasemeyer

customer_reviews.title: Music in the Moto!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to do an aftermarket custom installation of a single-den stereo on my ATV. I mounted these to part of the front roll cage. They are easy to mount and they do come with thin rubber strips to wrap around the bar your mounting it too to keep it from slipping into provide for some degree of dampening from vibration. These little speakers sound great but if you're looking for bellowing Lowe's this is not going to provide what you need but all in all it's a great sounding little speaker for the money and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Byrum

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Rollbar Speakers.  Fit 89 4Runner
customer_reviews.text: I added these to the rollbar on my 89 4Runner. They look sharp and were pretty easy to connect. The wiring was simple as they come with spring loaded clips on the back that you can just insert bare wire into. Bolting them to the roll-bar took some time but I got it figured out. It would have been much easier with the top removed but I didn’t want to wait for nice weather. These are a lot less than comparable speakers and they really improved the sound quality of my system. I’m no sound snob but to me they’re all that’s needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark McCall

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor product. The brackets don’t fit a Jeep roll cage. They sounded horrible. So I put a 300 watt amp, 150watts to each speaker and one of the speakers blew within 10 minutes. The amp wasn’t even turned up all the way or anything. These speakers obviously can’t handle the wattage that they’re marketing as. Very disappointed and wasted a lot of time and money trying to make them fit the Jeep roll cage. And there warranty is only a month, so by the time I was able to manufacture brackets for them and get them installed in the Jeep, it was past the 30 day window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Given the proper power these things rock. I have them on my hard too facing down to the water from the stern powers by a two channel amp. They project sound all around the back of the boat while you are in the water. Dollar for dollar you won’t beat these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: explore7425

customer_reviews.title: You'll need longer screws. Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: These did not fit properly on my wake tower. I had to pick up longer screws and then these worked perfectly and have had good sound quality for the first season. Unfortunately the bass blew out after sitting under a boat cover over the winter. I contracted customer service and even though I hadn't purchased an extra warranty they were covered. I destroyed the broken ones and they shipped me out new ones without any hassle at all. Awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Rex

customer_reviews.title: Great compact sound
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent sound for the money. Installed in our RZR connected to a marine grade low budget head unit and no complaints! It doesn't shake the neighbors windows with the bass but we can tool down the trail with plenty of volume and it does just fine without distorting. Adding an amplifier would probably add that 'expensive' sound but for our needs these sound fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: this game is soooooo awsome. love the way they have the players real first name!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: I'm very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Way better than I expected, I'm using at outdoor pool and neighbors 2 houses away can here my music with only a 50amp amplifier. These speakers are rated at 200watts. Just ordered a 100 amplifier and another set to put on my work truck for the hell of it I'll try the 750 watts speakers later on
customer_reviews.author: 4k Energy

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATER RESISTANT, NOT USABLE OUTSIDE.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is average, they are not easy to line up when putting the two sides together. My biggest problem however is I have them mounted on my rzr. After washing it a few times (being very careful not to spray the speaker with hose or power washer) the speakers have gone out. These lasted about 3 months compared to the year the other 3” speakers lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Anita C.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got 4 of these for my Yamaha ar210 wakevboard tower and am pleasantly surprised at the sound they can produce. Paired them with a Rockville 2600 amp and they rock the boat. Fit the tower perfectly and look great. They are nice because of their smaller size i'm not hitting my head on them every time i walk under the tower. Only complaint I have is the location of the wire inputs should be moved to the other side, but its a small gripe. For the price I don't think they can be beat.
customer_reviews.author: rollincoal

customer_reviews.title: What is this supposed to mount on?
customer_reviews.text: Spent hours trying to get this to mount on a Wake tower. Used the items that came with it, speaker kept falling, the adhesive strips made a mess. Has a very weird shape and I have no clue what this is supposed to fit on, it doesn't fit anything. Do yourself a favor, measure what you are putting speakers on and find something that will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Hill

customer_reviews.title: Four stars
customer_reviews.text: They sound great and Was somewhat easy to install. Had to change the bracket to a strap because the hole is too small for larger diameter tubing. I think the tubing is just over 2 inches and it’s too large for these built-in brackets. Not a big deal I fabricated up a strap and it looks great. That’s reason I gave it four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just not loud enough
customer_reviews.text: Had these hooked to crash bars on my motorcycle. Blew the speakers the second time out. They were fine up to about 60mph. Also, they are 4” cones, so sound is not real full. They are what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Bryon

customer_reviews.title: Good sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: I installed these between my roll bar and the fender well of my Jeep YJ. The clamp is not made to attach to a bar that big, so I had to modify it. Looks good, out of the way, and sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: Woodyard61

customer_reviews.title: Boat jams
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality got a five because they do sound great but don’t make the same mistake I did and get an amp that matches exactly rms/peak power because they do cut out at peak input so get a lower power amp rating but all in all they sound great not a bad product for price at all
customer_reviews.author: William Henley

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice speakers especially for the price. They work great with my Pyle 400 watt marine amp. I use these on my utv and they look and sound great and are plenty loud enough to hear over engine rev. They came with rubber shims to fit a variety of bar sizes. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: The Ram

customer_reviews.title: Not for motorcycle..
customer_reviews.text: Only issue I have is solely my fault. These are Not meant for motorcycle systems unless you have about a 3" bar diameter. Again, my fault. Hooked them up, sound awesome! UPDATE: dropped 2 stars. After I played them a few times one of the speakers blew and then the other, within a month. Expected a lil better from Boss speakers!
customer_reviews.author: Shane W.

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my sxs.
customer_reviews.text: They look great, feel, quality, and sound pretty good through a boss amp I purchased. I installed them on my Honda Pioneer 1000-5 and they are doing a great job just the pair. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: James C

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for the money
customer_reviews.text: So far these speakers are very good. I bought them to mount on my 4 wheeler they are very loud and clear. I am using them with a Bluetooth Pyle amp they work great I would definitely buy them again
customer_reviews.author: geoff arvesen

customer_reviews.title: Blew within 45 min
customer_reviews.text: product did not with stand the stated ratings. I did put the full rated load to speakers, but they blew within 45 min. recommend not going cheap and buying something much larger. definitely not fit for wakeboarding tower. maybe they are better suited for UTV's
customer_reviews.author: Joe. S

customer_reviews.title: We were looking for something that sounded good and didn’t break the bank for our side by ...
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for something that sounded good and didn’t break the bank for our side by side. These were easy to install, sound really really good, an amp would really make them kick! They look good, just mounted them to the roll bar. We have a 2012 Ranger and had to add a couple of the rubber shims.. but worked great. Highly recommended for the money. We are pleased!
customer_reviews.author: scott christison

customer_reviews.title: They sound GREAT
customer_reviews.text: You NEED a sub with these, but boy do they do the rest well. Glad I went with these cheap 4" instead of a much larger more expensive 6.5" They're component, and they sound great paired with any kind of sub. I'm using an 8" bazooka tube to fill out the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pitchford

customer_reviews.title: would buy again
customer_reviews.text: worked great in custom golf cart install, great sound, survived bouncing around
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W

customer_reviews.title: Bought for honda pioneer sxs
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great when you are not driving full speed. At full speed its hard to hear. Not the speakers. Too much noise from the sxs drowning out the music.
customer_reviews.author: clark

customer_reviews.title: Decent for side by side
customer_reviews.text: They sound decent for their size, sound quality isn't that great but they are loud
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a simple upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install on my Jeep Wrangler. Did have to use longer screws. Great sound
customer_reviews.author: John  P Ray jr

customer_reviews.title: These WILL NOT FIT a 2.5" Wake Tower Bar
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because of the good reviews they had, however, there are no specifications that I can see to show what size bars these will mount to. I have recently installed a Monster Tower on my boat (2.5" diameter) and these will not fit. Kind of sad because I bought them on a budget, I will be returning them and looking for something else with a better mount.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my VW thing. I can hear them over all the road noise and loud engine. Great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The directions are very simple and easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews before purchasing these speakers, Ifound most reviews quite helpful. Now about the speakers! The directions are very simple and easy to follow. The sound quality is pretty darn good. They not only sound great but they look just as good. I had thought about getting the next step up in Boss speakers, but when you're retired you have to watch your pennies. I don't regret the purchase of these speakers. Tim P.
customer_reviews.author: timothy pickett

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: These speakers performed much better than expected. They project the sound very well and have good highs and mids, with decent bass for the size speakers they are. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle S.

customer_reviews.title: These are the best bang for the buck if you just want music and don't need overwhelming bass
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the money. They won't make you go dead, but for 4" speakers they are respectable. I'm running mine with a Pyle Hydra 400w marine and they work well like that. If you want more bass, look for a 6.5" or 8", but these are great for some music on the trails.
customer_reviews.author: Loser

customer_reviews.title: Super satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well built. I put them on the roll bar of my side by side. I had to use the rubber sleeves that were supplied to take up the gap but, this also dampened the vibration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality speakers and sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was not disappointed with the quality or sound. If your looking for something to break the glass out of your windows you won’t be happy with these speakers however if you want good sound quality at a fun party level then this is a speaker you’ll like. I put mine on our boat and Love them. They are easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Don Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, great product. Include rubber spacers to fit smaller pipe size.
customer_reviews.author: GJP

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: It was so easy to install on my Contender 23! Great sound! Now we shall see how it stands up to the salt and the pounding on a boat.
customer_reviews.author: George Steele

customer_reviews.title: Works Great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife's Honda Pioneer 700-4. She loves them. we have it paired with a BOSS Marine Radio and have no issues of any kind. The Bass quality could be better, however we do understand its a sealed unit so it wont be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lonine

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING SOUNDS AND BUILD. 5*****!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I have these on my motorcycle and they are soooo loud! Even at 80mph. I love the gloss black finish. I wish the clamps rotate but not a huge deal to me. The bass and treble is outstanding!!!!!!! Running with a Memphis Audio MXA4.45 amp. Nice weight to them!! hetter than the 6.5 tower speakers ive had. YouTube Boss MRWT40 audio for sound clip
customer_reviews.author: Yamaha Raider 1900

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: mounted theses on the front forks of my 2016 Harley sporster 48 , i have very loud exhaust and finnaly i can hear my music over the loud exhaust , mounted 2 6x9 Boss speakers into the lids of my saddlebags . I have had more expensive speaker brands on this bike and none sounded as good as theses ! good product .
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Pane

customer_reviews.title: happy with outcome
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great for the price. Put in Honda pioneer 1000-5 loud and clear
customer_reviews.author: jeremy combs

customer_reviews.title: Big sound in a small package!
customer_reviews.text: For the money these things are great! Installed on my pioneer 1000 and they are plenty loud enough. No amp needed. I bridged my head unit and these speakers really put out good quality sounds. Highly recommended! As a bonus they aren’t so large that they get in your way!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Option for small / medium size boats
customer_reviews.text: Installed 4 of this speakers on my 28 foot boat, connected to a 400 watt AMP, sound is very good, and the materials for the speakers are truly water proof.
customer_reviews.author: FERNANDO A LARA VILLATORO

customer_reviews.title: These are worth it !
customer_reviews.text: Love these speakers. The mount are a little larger than i thought, but the included pads made them fit great. Install them on the roll bars in my amigo to free up the limited space i have in the back. Completely happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend put these on our SXS and we paired it with the Velez Bluetooth amp and controller and they sound awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love these speakers
customer_reviews.text: Love these speakers.... I'm running them with a Planet Audio radio and they sound great on my side by side.... I don't think you can push 200 watts per speaker tho..
customer_reviews.author: larry odell

customer_reviews.title: ATV speakers
customer_reviews.text: Really great speakers the have very good sound Water Resistant Bluetooth Marine 4 Channel Class A/B Amplifier Media Stereo on Boats UTV ATV Golf Carts and Cars  I used this to power the speakers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound horrible return service!!!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sounded great but they did not fit my wakeboard tower so I returned them and was never refunded my money. Wouldn’t recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Horne

customer_reviews.title: A great choice for your SxS!
customer_reviews.text: A reasonably priced choice for my Arctic Cat Wildcat 1000 SxS! Not tons of bass(which is expected in a speaker of this size) but, good overall sound quality & durability!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey E. Albright

customer_reviews.title: Sound great, look cool
customer_reviews.text: These sound great! I mounted them in my Suzuki Samurai and love them!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome speaker set - I put these on my Polaris Ranger and they Kick Ass
customer_reviews.author: Pete & Lilly

customer_reviews.title: OK not great
customer_reviews.text: I have them set up on my xp1k to compliment the MTX sound system. They do not hold up with the noise of the machine. At high volume they distort very noticeably. They're OK but in retrospect I'd go for bigger speakers.
customer_reviews.author: asaf maimon

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Alright, I mounted these on my Jeep tj roll bar, I bought 4. They sound great for the money. Alllll treble but I knew that before buying. I ran an amp to them to beef them up and it works well. It’s not crazy loud but just loud enough and pretty clear. If you want stupid loud find some 6.5s.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Green

customer_reviews.title: Cheap clamps
customer_reviews.text: The clamps are very cheap. I wouldn’t buy again just because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Mandra H.

customer_reviews.title: make sure its a big piece of pipe
customer_reviews.text: the roll cage i was gonna mount it to was not wide enough to fit snug so i just used the inclued bolts nd washer and mounted it to the front plastics and that seemed to work
customer_reviews.author: Auston Monteforte

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These were a great affordable option for speakers on the pioneer. Combined with the boss marine (round) radio, I got a whole water-proof system for <150$. Litttle condensation in the screen after riding a while but goes away and doesn’t seem to affect anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Sounded terrible and very distorted even hooked up to my amp. Only was refunded half of my purchase price. BUYER BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: Landon&Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little speakers
customer_reviews.text: Hooked these little speakers up tonight and am very pleased with the sound out of these little speakers. Put them in my sxs and they sound great
customer_reviews.author: lawrence w nero

customer_reviews.title: good price and loud enough to hear over my v8 ...
customer_reviews.text: small with a clear loud sound. good price and loud enough to hear over my v8 jeep buggy
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gains

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhhh
customer_reviews.text: Defintely not 400 watts......probably 60 watts max each. SOUND QUALITY IS OK. I have it on a 100 watt amp.and the amp is to wrong for them
customer_reviews.author: jay perez

customer_reviews.title: Quality your sound
customer_reviews.text: Small but excellent. These are great speakers from BOSS. I had installed on my Suzuki M109. Works great even with high volume and no distortion. Go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shankii

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: Mounted them in my Jeep to boost the volume so I could still hear my music at 60mph+ Connectors retain the speaker wire more Securely.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Giffin

customer_reviews.title: good speakers for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and Loud. very pleased. does not come with any speaker wire
customer_reviews.author: scottk

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: CAME WITHOUT RUBBER TO INSERT WHERE ROLL BAR IS. WONT MOUNT WITHOUT IT. CANT USE YET !!! FRUSTRATING
customer_reviews.author: Craig S

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Top of the line sound is amazing! Very happy with our choice and would highly recommend it to others looking to buy.
customer_reviews.author: MountainAngel64

customer_reviews.title: Sound Great!
customer_reviews.text: Installed these on my Tractor. These things are great and easy to install. I attached them to PVC tubing and u bolted them to my canopy.
customer_reviews.author: Louisiana Man

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and they sound great on my side by side, especially for the price, better than the jbls that were on it before.
customer_reviews.author: What did I order again?

customer_reviews.title: 10 out of 10
customer_reviews.text: Super loud! I installed these on my rzr and they are great. I had a mtx soundbar before I got these and the soundbar costed nearly 400. The quality and sound of the soundbar is terrible compared to these. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Moore

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Speaker wire connector corroded a year after installation and it is not repairable. Chinese junk.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome a must for UTV
customer_reviews.text: They sound pretty loud for 4” speakers. Really like the sound and quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose M.

customer_reviews.title: Great on SxS
customer_reviews.text: Installed four on Honda Pioneer SxS...great sound, used with 400 amp to boost sound, definitely recommend an amp if want good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Sound good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and sound great. For the price not a bad deal! Will see how durable they are from here.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Frizell

customer_reviews.title: Blown out
customer_reviews.text: PIECe of S*** blew in a day!!! Don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Marina Reddekopp

customer_reviews.title: Great boat or utv speakers
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers, easy to install on utv cage, sound great, look sweet recommend with Boss marine radio.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Robinson

customer_reviews.title: These are nice with good sound
customer_reviews.text: These are nice with good sound. The plastic housing feels a little cheap, but lining it with Dynamat on the inside helps.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Estes

customer_reviews.title: Great for about a month
customer_reviews.text: Well this product was awesome for the first month. Now the speakers are shorted out and do not function. One speaker is actually blown
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: Way too small. I knew they were going to be small but that small. The sound is really low.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound great!
customer_reviews.text: At first I said, “wow these are small!”. However, they sound great considering the money spent and the size... very very pleased..
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto E.

customer_reviews.title: The base is non existent.
customer_reviews.text: Sound good when wired to a head unit. Loud and the sound reaches far, but not very full sound. Good if you have a jeep tj and want to mount some louder speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the quality/price ratio!
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for the buck out there, I have 4 of these with a 10” sub and amp on my Intimidator UTV Clear as can be and easy to install. Couldn’t ask for more at the price
customer_reviews.author: Samantha May

customer_reviews.title: yes clarity!
customer_reviews.text: surprising sound, clear clear and with a sub just great on my FJ40's roll bar...
customer_reviews.author: idajeanne cioffi

customer_reviews.title: Nice speakers
customer_reviews.text: These speakers work great on my Brute Force, surprising amount of bass for a four inch speaker, buying two more soon
customer_reviews.author: Luke Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe how loud these are. Thought I would need amp but definitely was wrong. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Haughey

customer_reviews.title: Great value for expanding marine stereo setup
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the size, and perfect for mounting on a t-top. Installed a few months ago on 22 proline - no signs of corrosion or other wear.
customer_reviews.author: akaqua

customer_reviews.title: My Third Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I have installed 3 of these in off road side by sides. I like the quality and may install one in my peek up truck.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bobo

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good speakers for the money. Installed easily on the roll bar of my '79 CJ7 Jeep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: definitly not able to withsand 200 wats each
customer_reviews.text: Paired these with a 4 channel bridged to 2 channel 400 watt kenwood amp and they blew within 20 minutes. Both of them
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the money. Put them in my rzr. You can hear them perfect at full throttle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These speakers sound good with or without a amp on them
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied I have these set up underneath my canopy to be able to listen to music while I work or just hangout with friends they are very clear and sounds great
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: When I returned the item, I only received half my money back.
customer_reviews.text: I never used the product, but have been trying to get my money back since June 24.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Turner, Sr.

product_meta.title: BOSS Audio Systems MRWT40RGB Marine Waketower Speaker System - 400 Watts of Power Per Pair, 200 Watts Each, 4 Inch, Full Range, 2 Way, RGB Led Illumination, Marine Grade, Weatherproof, Sold In Pairs
feature_bullets: Rgb illumination: change the mood to a color suits your taste with the multi color illumination option. It looks great, especially at night!
Cone: made from polyurethane, The MRWT40RGB 4-inch Marine waketower speakers provide a resilient and durable material that can offer great sound with the advantage of long-lasting speakers
Voice coil: our voice coils are able to withstand high temperatures yet maintain its strength and fatigue properties. This gives our speakers The advantage of longer play times with lower weights

Surround: rubber Has the ability to endure much punishment without any sign of damage. It complements the whole structure of the speaker by allowing constant abuse where it is most needed, without the wear and tear
Weatherproof: the MRWT40RGB has been outfitted with the latest weatherproofing techniques for protection against the elements
Specs: impedance – 4 ohms, Frequency – 130 Hz to 20 kHz, Dimensions – 7.1” x 5.4” x 7.1”, weight – 5.8 lbs.

Warranty: BOSS Audio Systems provides a powerful 3-year Platinum online dealer warranty so long as the purchase is made through Amazon.Com. We strongly encourage Professional installation of this product to ensure proper and safe functionality
